I'm sorry -- @antifriz what you describe looks like it's working as intended. What would be the desired behavior here?

The scoping differences should be immaterial, you should be able to save and load Keras models between the different backends, etc.

Important is that reusing a layer reuses the variables, and that using a new layer will not share any variables.

@fchollet FYI, if you see an issue here that I missed.

I'm sorry -- @antifriz what you describe looks like it's working as intended. What would be the desired behavior here? 

The scoping differences should be immaterial, you should be able to save and load *Keras* models between the different backends, etc.

Important is that reusing a layer reuses the variables, and that using a new layer will *not* share any variables.

@fchollet FYI, if you see an issue here that I missed.
